WorkItem.Description:
Contrary to expectations, when one inserts new rows using insertNewRowBefore() existing rows get their height altered. A similar situation is found when one tries to remove rows using removeRow().
 
Demonstration script added.
 
This issue was created for this discussion topic:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=32551
 
Environment:
PHPExcel: Latest source from SVN (change set 15344) 1.6.2+
WorkItem.Summary: Row heights not updated correctly when inserting new rows

Comments.Message: Great fix... I downloaded, tested, and it worked :)
